workflow_description: 1. Click 'Laptops' in categories. 2. Click on 'Sony vaio i5'. 3. Click 'Add to cart'. 4. Accept the 'Product added' alert. 5. Navigate to 'Cart'. 6. Verify product 'Sony vaio i5' is in the cart. 7. Click 'Place Order'. 8. Verify 'Place order' modal appears. 9. Fill 'Name' with 'Antigravity User' and 'Credit card' with '1234567890'. 10. Click 'Purchase'. 11. Verify 'Thank you for your purchase!' message appears.
